tasks.label: Build API Service with Clean Architecture
Add Initial Migration

tasks.label: Add Initial Migration (From Database Project)

tasks.label: Add Initial Migration Verbose
tasks.command: dotnet ef migrations add InitialCreate --context ChurchRegisterWebContext --project ChurchRegister.Database --startup-project ChurchRegister.ApiService --verbose
